attributes.action: Stop penalising British people for the sake of immigration and the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Why should we the British people be penalised for the sake of Immigration and the EU.
The entire infrastructure of Britain is collapsing, we cannot look after our old people, hosptials, housing, road networks, schools.
Rules and Regulations have been brought in to force to put immigration and the EU first and the British citizen second. Action must be taken to help us the British citizen that has helped to build this once good country.
